name: tailwind-pro
description: 1. Vai su `https://tailwindcss.com/docs/installation/tailwind-cli` 2. Lancia `npm init` e enter fino alla fine 3. Lancia `npm install tailwindcss @tailwindcss/cli` 4. crea la cartella `src` 5. Inserisci in src/input.css `@import "tailwindcss";` 6. Lancia `npx @tailwindcss/cli -i ./src/input.css -o ./src/output.css --watch` 7. Crea un file in `src/index.html`
